name: Collapsible
description: Toggleable content section with animated expand/collapse transitions

accessibility.screenReader: Trigger announces with aria-expanded state (true/false) and aria-controls pointing to content region. Disabled state is announced via aria-disabled. Content region has unique ID for association.

recommendedUsage: Use for progressive disclosure of optional or supplementary content. Ideal for 'Show more' patterns, additional details, or secondary information that doesn't need to be visible by default.
antiPatterns: Do not use for critical content that users must see. For multiple collapsible sections, consider Accordion instead. Avoid nesting collapsibles deeply.
